      R:Reinvest is selected as Interest Payment Method at the Product level.

title: FS-IRA-009/PSA-TD-005-044/Ability to restrict the user from making a regular contribution beyond contribution age limit defined at the plan level-Traditional/Positive
description:
RTC Test Case Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to restrict the user from making a regular contribution beyond contribution age limit defined at the plan level and system must display hard stop error message that is "Regular Contribution to this account is not allowed as the customers age is beyond the Contribution Age Limit."
Note: Contribution Limit age for Traditional Plan is 70 1/2 years.
Success Criteria: System restricts the user from making a regular contribution beyond contribution age limit defined at the plan level and displays the error message.


  
    RTC Test Suite Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to restrict the user from making a regular contribution beyond contribution age limit defined at the plan level and system must display hard stop error message that is "Regular Contribution to this account is not allowed as the customers age is beyond the Contribution Age Limit."
Note: Contribution Limit age for Traditional Plan is 70 1/2 years.
Success Criteria: System restricts the user from making a regular contribution beyond contribution age limit defined at the plan level and displays the error message.
stepAction:
User :  Authorized User      
      
        Customer : Any        
        Product : IRA      
      
        Plan: Traditional        
        Account : Any      
      
        Screen: IRA Contribution Screen      
      
        Customer age is greater than 70 1/2 years      
      
        Contribution age limit has been set 70 1/2 at the plan level for Traditional
stepResult: Set Up Step

stepAction:
Keyword / IRA / Access the IRA Contribution Screen.

.
Go to "IRA Contribution Details" section ->Select " Contribution Type " as "Regular Contribution" -> Enter other mandatory details  - > Click on "Submit" button.
stepResult: A hard error message " Regular Contribution to this account is not allowed as the customer age is beyond Contribution Age Limit" must be displayed. So, amount must not be deposited/contributed to the Traditional IRA account.

stepAction:
Post Condition:
  
NA
stepResult: Clean Up Step

title: FS-IRA-010/PSA-TD-005-076/ability to capture a distribution reason and Remarks while closing an IRA Account - At Full Distribution screen
description:
RTC Test Case Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to capture a distribution reason and remarks  while closing an IRA account using a drop-down list. Drop-down list must have following options:
a. Purpose Served/No longer Needed,
b. Moving out of Area,
c. Financial Need/Consolidating accounts,
d. Dissatisfied with Products/Fees/Rate,
e. Product Change/Better competitor product,
f. Dissatisfied with Customer service/Bank relationship,
g. Dissatisfied with Hours and/or Locations
h. Client Request Fraud/Lost/Stolen,
i. Bank close
j. Death/Divorce(Fraud/Misuse/Legal/Docs)
k. Other/Unknown
I. Escheated
Success Criteria: System captures the distribution reason and remarks  while closing the IRA Account and above values are available in the drop down list of "Distribution Reason" field.
Note: These fields are only available for full redemption


  
    RTC Test Suite Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to capture a distribution reason and remarks  while closing an IRA account using a drop-down list. Drop-down list must have following options:
a. Purpose Served/No longer Needed,
b. Moving out of Area,
c. Financial Need/Consolidating accounts,
d. Dissatisfied with Products/Fees/Rate,
e. Product Change/Better competitor product,
f. Dissatisfied with Customer service/Bank relationship,
g. Dissatisfied with Hours and/or Locations
h. Client Request Fraud/Lost/Stolen,
i. Bank close
j. Death/Divorce(Fraud/Misuse/Legal/Docs)
k. Other/Unknown
I. Escheated
Success Criteria: System captures the distribution reason and remarks  while closing the IRA Account and above values are available in the drop down list of "Distribution Reason" field.
Note: These fields are only available for full redemption

g. Dissatisfied with Hours and/or Locations
h. Client Request Fraud/Lost/Stolen,
i. Bank close
j. Death/Divorce(Fraud/Misuse/Legal/Docs)
k. Other/Unknown
    
I. Escheated

title: FS-IRA-010/PSA-TD-005-104/CR:19751/Ability to reverse accrued interest on revocation of IRA - Full Distribution Screen
description:
RTC Test Case Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to reverse accrued interest on revocation of IRA.
When the transaction is performed for Revocation, the accrued interest is reversed and only principal is paid out.
Explanation: All the accrued interest must zero out and must not be included in the Closing Balance.
Success Criteria: System must reverse accrued interest on revocation of IRA.


  
    RTC Test Suite Description:
  
  
System must have the ability to reverse accrued interest on revocation of IRA.
Explanation: All the accrued interest must zero out and must not be included in the Closing Balance.
Success Criteria: System must reverse accrued interest on revocation of IRA.

      User to verify system allows to select distribution type as "Revocation". User will entered all the other mandatory fields on the screen and then verify at transaction inquiry screen that system reversed the accrued interest and does not include in the closing balance of the Account.
stepResult: Set Up Step

title: FS-DDA-017/PSA-DDA-021-199/System charges redirect account when fee fails to post to account fee bearing account
description:
RTC Test Case Description:
  
  
The system must be able to charge a redirected fee to a redirected account without charging the fee to the account where the fee originated.
Success Criteria: The system will have charged a redirected fee to a redirected account without charging the fee to the account where the fee originated.


  
    RTC Test Suite Description:
  
  
The system must be able to charge a redirected fee to a redirected account without charging the fee to the account where the fee originated.
Success Criteria: The system will have charged a redirected fee to a redirected account without charging the fee to the account where the fee originated.

Product: Any
User: Authorized User
Screen: Transaction history screen
Involvement: Fee Processing
    
-Must have an active account that is eligible to redirect fees from. Primary
    
-Must have an active account the is eligible to have fees redirected to. This account is already linked the Primary for Fee Redirection. Must also have a balance high enough to incur fees
stepResult: Setup step.

Navigation is still under construction.

..

stepResult: Fee transaction must not be performed on primary account.

..
Verify transactions performed on Fee Redirection Account.
stepResult: Fee transaction must be listed in transaction inquiry of Fee Redirection Account.

stepResult: System will have displayed the "Account Inquiry" Screen (032000)

stepResult: Available balance must have decreased by the amount of the fee

title: FS-DDA-017/PSA-DDA-021-201/Upon fee redirection execution, there is a non-finanacial narration to distinguish redirected fees
description:
RTC Test Case Description:
  
  
Upon fee redirection execution, the fee redirection account must display an additional non-finacial narration as follows "Redirected Fee from ".
Note: This distinguishes redirected fees from all others.
Success Criteria: Upon fee redirection execution, the fee redirection account must display an additional non-finacial narration as follows "Redirected Fee from ".


  
    RTC Test Suite Description:
  
  
Upon fee redirection execution, the fee redirection account must display an additional non-finacial narration as follows "Redirected Fee from ".
Note: This distinguishes redirected fees from all others.
Success Criteria: Upon fee redirection execution, the fee redirection account must display an additional non-finacial narration as follows "Redirected Fee from ".
stepAction:
Product: Any
User: Authorized User
Screen: Account Inquiry (032000)
Involvement: Fee Processing
    
-fee redirection account must be active
    
-product level transaction classificaton codes, fee promo is set to yes
    
-Account to be entered as the fee redirect account must have the following conditions:
    
-it must be in an active status
    
-it must not be a closed account
    
-the account must have a positive balance high enough to incur the fee(s)
    
-Primary account is to incur a fee after EOD which triggers redirection of the fee
stepResult: Setup step.
